alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 2:08PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Saturday. The strongest winds are expected late Friday afternoon and evening. The heaviest snow is expected Friday morning and evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
